SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.CLI

Class TextualUI

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.CLI.TextualUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
UI, ViewSubject
public class TextualUI extends Object implements UI
The TextualUI class represents a textual user interface for a game. It contains a method to get the player's nickname and all the methods to display the game elements and information regarding the turn and the score. It contains also methods which get actions by the current player on the tiles and his shelf. It implements the UI interface.
